turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order one pizza from little caesars

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: excellent, which pizza would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: one medium pepperoni and sausage pizzza

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: im sorry, little caesars does not carry medium pizzas. only large. Would you like to adjust your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, ill have one large pepperoni and sausage pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm sorry, can i add bacon to the pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One large bacon, sausage and pepperoni pizza correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I am confirming your order. Would you like your total now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your total is 11.69

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How much does each topping cost?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 6 dollars for a specialty one topping plus 1.75 each additional topping

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: okay thats fine

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: once again, 11.69 your total. your card will be charged automatically and your order will be ready in 25 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay ill be there in 10

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: excellent, have a good day

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: bye

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: bye
